title: Champ select problem Patch 7.14
body: when ever i enter champion select my computer shuts off. i did this in ranked and in training mode and it happened 100% of the time. I cant play league until this is fixed so please fix rito <3

replies.body:
Sounds like you have an overheating issue, your pc is fine when its just idling but when you do anything requiring juice it just dies.

solution: turn off pc and unplug, open up big scary pc and clean out the 9 inches of dust in the case + fans + power supply with a can of compressed air.

Stuff like this is a fire hazard at worst and a recipe to fry your system at best so clear out all that dust first, if your not comfortable working on or messing with the inside of your pc then take it in to a shop to get help.

Also of note if you have pets either cat or dog ( i have both ) your pc cannot be resting at ground level and should be sitting on your desk with the monitor and having animals will also require that you do regularly dust out the case with compressed air every 2 months or so.

Hi thadrine, sorry to hear about your problem! What sort of computer are you playing on? What are it's specifications (CPU, GPU, operating system, RAM)? Does your computer crash when running any other programs or games? Thanks, and I hope to have things resolved for you soon!
